name: Empire Box Corporation of Stroudsburg v. Chesnut et al., Appellants

judges: Before Maxey, O. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Empire Box Corporation of Stroudsburg v. Chesnut et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
It would be idle repetition to repeat the facts and law of this case, because both are fully set out in the able and comprehensive opinion of the learned court below. That the conclusion reached there is accurate beyond any doubt is clear.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, with her James K. Duff, Attorney General, for appellants.
Sterling Cr. McNees, with him William Felstiner, James H. Booser, Spiro, Felstiner & Prager and MdNees, Wallace & Rurioh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Empire Box Corporation of Stroudsburg v. Chesnut et al., Appellants.
Argued May 22, 1945.
Before Maxey, O. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, with her James K. Duff, Attorney General, for appellants.
Sterling Cr. McNees, with him William Felstiner, James H. Booser, Spiro, Felstiner & Prager and MdNees, Wallace & Rurioh, for appellee.
June 29, 1945.
